headline: 5 Soft Drink Stocks Battling for Relevance Amid Consumer Taste Shift
summary: Beverages - Soft Drinks industry players face cost & tariff headwinds, while health-driven demand, digital growth & innovation open fresh growth avenues. Let us see if top players like KO, PEP, MNST, KDP, and ZVIA can sustain relevance in a rapidly evolving market.

headline: Should Coca-Cola sell Costa Coffee?
summary: Coca-Cola is reportedly weighing up the future of Costa and industry watchers believe now might be the time for the soft-drinks giant to wake up and smell the coffee.
